rdf:RDF:
[% collection_name %] [% link %]
[%- FOR event = events -%] [%- IF event.event_class == 'page'; event.uri = "/$event.page.workspace_name?$event.page.id"; ELSE; event.uri = "/?profile/$event.actor.id"; END -%]
[%- END -%]
[%- FOR event = events -%]
[% event.uri %] [% INCLUDE data/event e=event out='text' %] [% INCLUDE data/event e=event out='html' %]
[%- END -%]
